derivation: rarely מְלוֹא; or מְלוֹ; (Ezekiel [41:8), from H4390 (מָלֵא);
outline:
1. fulness, that which fills
    1. fulness, handful
    2. mass, multitude
    3. fulness, that which fills, entire contents
    4. full length, full line
kjv_def: [idiom] all along, [idiom] all that is (there-) in, fill, ([idiom] that whereof...was) full, fulness, (hand-) full, multitude.
